Title: Establishes a maternal health monitoring pilot program
Summary: Establishes a maternal health monitoring pilot program within the department of health to offer eligible participants improved maternal health care through remote patient monitoring for maternal hypertension and maternal diabetes; requires delivery of a report.
LawCode: Add ยง2500-n, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to establishing a maternal health monitoring pilot program
